sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react';
import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form';
import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col';
import InfoCard from './InfoCard';
import DispatchContext from '../context/user';


const UserInfo = () => {
    const context = useContext(DispatchContext)
    console.log('info: ')
    console.log(context)
    const onChange = (event) => {
        console.log(event.target.id)
        console.log(event.target.value)
    }

    return (
        <Form>
            <InfoCard title={'Personuppgifter'}>
                <Form.Row>
                    <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="email">
                        <Form.Label className="text-muted">Mail</Form.Label>
                        <Form.Control type="email" placeholder="name@example.com" onChange={onChange}/>
                    </Form.Group>

                    <Form.Group as={Col}>
                        <Form.Label>Välj fil</Form.Label>
                        <Form.File id="custom-file" label="Ladda upp foto" data-browse="Bläddra" custom onChange={onChange}/>
                    </Form.Group>
                </Form.Row>

                <Form.Row>
                    <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="firstName">
                        <Form.Label>Förnamn</Form.Label>
                        <Form.Control placeholder="Karl" onChange={onChange}/>
                    </Form.Group>

                    <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="lastName">
                        <Form.Label>Efternamn</Form.Label>
                        <Form.Control placeholder="Jansson" onChange={onChange}/>
                    </Form.Group>
                </Form.Row>

                <Form.Row>
                    <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="title">
                        <Form.Label>Titel</Form.Label>
                        <Form.Control placeholder="Lärare" onChange={onChange}/>
                    </Form.Group>

                    <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="phone">
                        <Form.Label>Telefonnummer</Form.Label>
                        <Form.Control placeholder="+46760042332" onChange={onChange}/>
                    </Form.Group>
                </Form.Row>
            </InfoCard>
        </Form>
    )
}



export default UserInfo
